TextBody:
ref:_00D7091pB._500Q000CZO0a:ref

I would like to perform my own troubleshooting steps on the EPP server back end.  For this I need access to the backend via SSH.  Netwrix support are aware of my proficiency with regards to maintaining ngnix.conf files (that get changed when generating certificates and stop the ngnix server from starting).

Thanks

Nigel

TextBody:
Hello Nigel,

Thank you for getting back to us.

Can we schedule a short session today at 14:00 BST to add the hotfix manually? 

If the timeframe does not suit you please provide us 2 3 slots with your availability for the next week.

Have a nice day ahead! 

Best regards,
